ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: I got the nicest compliment last night.  One of my clerics told me, Boy, I have MISSED having you tank for me.  That makes it all worthwhile, doesn t it?
ygData.messageBody:
I got the nicest compliment last night. One of my clerics told me,
"Boy, I have MISSED having you tank for me." That makes it all
worthwhile, doesn't it?
<grins>

Sara, Povar

"." wrote:

>
>
> I play a 31 wood elf warrior on the karana server.I
> feel it is alot of fun being the center of attention...I stand and get
> hit all the time and slash away at the badies while others heal me.
> Getting buffs from the casters in the group really makes things
> nice.Since I am the one protecting everybody i put my self in the
> position and state of mind that .I am a mother protecting my
> children.And it really gives me a nice feeling inside.Being a warrior
> has been very satisfying for me.It is always nice to do things you
> couldnt otherwise do in real life..I have always fantasized about
> being a warrior in those dark days.And herein eq i can do just that.
> *giggles*
>
> *smiles*
> Kilara
